Verses: 1 virumbappadaadha Jaadhiye, Kattalai Pirakkumunnum Padharaippola Naan Parandhupogumunnum Karththarudaiya Ukkirakobam Ungalmel Irangumunnum,karththarudaiya Kobaththin Naal Ungalmel Varumunnum,

3 dhesaththilulla Ellaa Sirumaiyaanavargale, Karththarudaiya Nyaayaththai Nadappikkiravargale, Avaraith Thedungal; Needhiyaith Thedungal, Manaththaazhmaiyaith Thedungal; Appozhudhu Oruvelai Karththarudaiya Kobaththin Naalile Maraikkappaduveergal.
4 kaadhsaa Kudiyatru, Askalon Paazhaagum; Asthoththaip Pattappagalile Parakkadippaargal; Ekron Verode Pidungappadum.
5 samuththirakkarai Kudigalaagiya Kireththiyarukku Pelistharin Dhesamaagiya Kaanaane, Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Unakku Virodhamaayirukkiradhu; Ini Unnil Kudiyillaadhapadikku Unnai Azhippen.
6 samuththirakkarai Dhesam Meyppar Thangum Kudilgalum Aattuththozhuvangalumaagum.

7 andha Dhesam Yoodhaa Vamsaththaaril Meedhiyaanavargalin Vamsamaagum; Avargal Avvidangalil Mandhai Meyppaargal; Askalonin Veedugalile Saayankaalaththile Paduththukkolvaargal; Avargaludaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Avargalai Visaariththu, Avargal Siraiyiruppaith Thiruppuvaar.
8 movaab Seydha Nindhanaiyaiyum, Ammon Puththirar En Janaththai Nindhiththu, Avargal Ellaiyaik Kadandhuperumai Paaraatti Sonna Dhooshanangalaiyum Ketten.

9 aagaiyaal Movaab Sodhomaippolum, Ammon Puththirarin Dhesam Gomoraavaip Polumaaga, Kaanchori Padarum Idamum, Uppup Pallamum, Niththiya Paazhumaayirukkum; En Janaththil Meendhavargal Avargalaik Kollaiyittu, En Jaadhiyil Meedhiyaanavargal Avargalai Sudhandhariththukkolvaargal Enbadhai En Jeevanaikkondu Sollugiren Endru Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Senaigalin Karththar Uraikkiraar.
10 avargal Senaigaludaiya Karththarin Janaththukku Virodhamaaip Perumaipaaraatti Avargalai Nindhiththapadiyinaal, Idhu Avargal Agangaaraththukkup Padhilaaga Avargalukkuk Kidaikkum.

11 karththar Avargalmel Kediyaayiruppaar; Boomiyilulla Dhevargalaiyellaam Melindhupogappannuvaar; Appozhudhu Theevugalilulla Sagala Purajaadhigalum Avaravar Thangal Thangal Sthaanaththilirundhu Avaraip Panindhukolvaargal.
13 avar Thamadhu Kaiyai Vadadhesaththukku Virodhamaai Neetti, Aseeriyaavai Azhiththu, Niniveyaip Paazhum Vanaandharaththukkoththa Varatchiyumaana Sthalamaakkuvaar.

14 adhin Naduvil Mandhaigalum Jaadhiyaana Sagala Mirugangalum Paduththukkollum; Adhinudaiya Sigarangalinmel Naaraiyum Kottaanum Raaththangum; Palaganigalil Koovugira Saththam Pirakkum; Vaasarpadigalil Paazhkkadippu Irukkum; Kedhurumarangalin Machchaith Thirappaakkippoduvaar.

15 naandhaan, Ennaith Thavira Veroruvarum Illai Endru Than Irudhayaththil Solli, Nirvisaaramaai Vaazhndhu Kalikoorndhirundha Nagaram Idhuve; Idhu Paazhum Mirugajeevangalin Thaabaramumaaippoivittadhe! Adhin Vazhiyaaippogiravan Evanum Eesal Pottuth Than Kaiyaik Kottuvaan.
